name: Andrei Stoleru
body:
### Welcome 

### Who am I
My name is Andrei Stoleru and I'm a father and a husband.
I'm Romanian, but I've lived for almost 10 years in Torino, Italy, 2 years in Munich and, since June, 2015 I'm in Berlin, Germany (where I plan to live for the foreseeable future). I'm an iOS developer since late 2007 (time flies) and before that I did some Mac, Windows and web-development.  
  
### Contact  
You can reach me on [twitter](https://twitter.com/andreistoleru) or via [email](mailto:andrei.stoleru@gmail.com).   
Live long and prosper!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
